messages.subject: Interview with Jean Liedloff, author of The Continuum Concept
messages.msgSnippet: Those of you interested in instinctual parenting, attachment parenting, and The Continuum Concept would be enjoy listening to this Sep. 8 web show. Jean
messages.messageBody:
Those of you interested in instinctual parenting, attachment parenting, and
The Continuum Concept would be enjoy listening to this Sep. 8 web show. Jean
Liedloff and parents speak on their experience. Unschooling and John Holt
are mentioned.

The show is archived - it looks like they keep the shows up there for only
two weekdays, so you may be able to hear it until Tuesday. Try this link:

http://199.170.230.158/smil/hlth_arc_mm.smi?show=psychtodaymm&id=42&date=090
82000

If this doesn't work, go to www.eyada.com, select the show Psychtoday, then
choose the Sept. 8 show.

Shannon Brophy
Yoga.com: Yoga, Massage and Natural Healing

~Resources and holistic products from Roots & Wings at http://www.yoga.com
